item.description: [03.03] DOGE, the bigger ambition Elon Musk always wanted absolute control. Control Tesla, control OpenAI, control Twitter. But as a businessman, he manuevered in political environments that he couldn’t control. In the early days of SpaceX and Tesla, deals from the Obama government were critical for the companies’ survival. Not surprisingly, he supported the democrats. Just as he scrabbled to find evidence of Sam Altman denouncing Trump in ~2016 after the Stargate project infuriated him, during the very same period, Musk called Trump a “con-man”, “one of the worldâ€™s best bullshitters ever”, “the worldâ€™s champion of bullshit”.
